Description: Body sherd of North Ionian black-figured pottery dinos or krater; iinterior reserved; exterior: band with traces of added white below animal frieze: rear of feline to left and rear foot of a second to right; some added red. Heavily burnt.
Curator's comments: Sherd possibly cut down for re-use, then burnt. From same vase as 1924,1201.982, 1017 and 1021.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.632)
